00009 function href($url, $title, $attributes=array()) {
00010         global $config;
00011         $attributeString = '';
00012         foreach($attributes as $attribute=>$value) {
00013                 $attributeString .= sEscape::html($attribute).'="'.sEscape::html($value).'"';
00014         }
00015         if(strpos($url, 'http://') !== 0 && strpos($url, 'https://') !== 0) {
00016                 $url = $config->base_url.$config->index_file.$url;
00017         }
00018         echo '<a '.$attributeString.' href="'.sEscape::html($url).'">'.sEscape::html($title).'</a>';
00019 }

00031 function docType($type = 'html_trans') {
00032         $docType = '';
00033         switch ($type) {
00034                 case 'xhtml1_strict':
00035                         $docType = '<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN"
00036    "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">';
00037                         break;
00038                 case 'xhtml1_trans':
00039                         $docType = '<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN"
00040    "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">';
00041                         break;
00042                 case 'html4_strict':
00043                         $docType = '<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN"
00044    "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd">';
00045                         break;
00046                 case 'html4_trans':
00047                         $docType = '<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN"
00048   "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd">';
00049                         break;
00050                 case 'html5':
00051                         $docType = '<!DOCTYPE html>';
00052                         break;
00053         }
00054         echo $docType;
00055 }

00061 function metaTag($attributes) {
00062         if(!is_array($attributes)) {
00063                 throw new Exception('Attributes must be provided in array format');
00064         }
00065         $attributeList = ' ';
00066         foreach($attributes as $attribute=>$value) {
00067                 $attributeList .= sEscape::html($attribute) .'="'.sEscape::html($value).'" ';
00068         }
00069         echo '<meta'.$attributeList.'/>';
00070 }

00077 function charset() {
00078         global $config;
00079         $attributes = array(
00080                 'http-equiv'=>'Content-Type',
00081                 'content'=>'text/html; charset='.$config->char_encoding,
00082         );
00083         metaTag($attributes);
00084 }

00092 function css($file, $media=array('all')) {
00093         global $config;
00094         if(!is_array($media)) {
00095                 throw new Exception('media must be provided in array format');
00096         }
00097         if(strpos($file, 'http://') === 0 || strpos($file, 'https://') === 0) {
00098                 $str = '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="'.sEscape::html($file).'"';
00099         } else {
00100                 $str = '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="'.sEscape::html($config->base_url.'public/css/'.$file).'"';
00101         }
00102         $str .= ' media = "'.sEscape::html(implode(',', $media)).'" />';
00103         echo $str;
00104 }
00105 
00111 function js($file) {
00112         global $config;
00113         if(strpos($file, 'http://') === 0 || strpos($file, 'https://') === 0) {
00114                 echo '<script type="text/javascript" src="'.sEscape::html($file).'" ></script>';
00115         } else {
00116                 echo '<script type="text/javascript" src="'.sEscape::html($config->base_url."public/js/$file").'" ></script>';
00117         }
00118 }
